title: Pete, Drinker of Blood
description: Librarian's Note: this is an alternate cover edition - ASIN: B009MRXLOY Pete Tyler is a blue-collar guy working nights in Hollywood. He’s also a vampire. He lives alone and avoids the other vampires in L.A., but Pete’s simple life goes haywire when he falls for Angie, the cute bartender at a Sunset Strip dive -- and when sinister vampire lord Carson Fitzgerald returns to claim his children, Pete learns that nothing's ever easy for a creature of the night.
author: Scott S. Phillips
